successes.title: WISH I WAS HERE
successes.description: "Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something." - Thomas A. Edison

Pledges.description:
PRODUCTION DIARY//
You're now a part of this movie making club, and I want to show you the process, from start to finish. Each week throughout this summer's shoot you will receive my Production Diary. This will include a video memo from me (with cameos from the cast and crew) detailing the process of making the movie. You'll also get casting and production news first, before the Hollywood trades. And, I'll email you a PDF of the  "WISH I WAS HERE" screenplay right before the movie premieres.

SOUNDTRACK AND PLAYLISTS// You'll be the first to hear the soundtrack for "WISH I WAS HERE," before it's released, via a streaming link. And, I'll create and send you a brand new playlist each week of production for your listening pleasure.
You'll also get our Production Diary and the script.

BACKER’S THANK YOU SCREENING// A first of its kind live group movie screening across the world. I'll host at least three live online screenings of the film. Watch from your computer or mobile device, and after each screening, I'll stick around to answer as many of your questions about the film as I can via online Q&A
You'll also get a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.
WISH I WAS HERE TEE SHIRT// I'm designing a shirt just for our backers. I promise you, these won’t just be your run of the mill giveaway tee shirts, these tees will be soft as a kitten taint
You'll also get an invite to our Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

FRAMABLE ART PRINTS// Three pieces of art, printed in high quality and ready for framing. Choose from selects of either previs artist Colin Fix's concept art, or production stills from the movie. I'll send out a backer update with options, so you can help choose the selects you want included.
You'll also get our tee shirt, an invite to our Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

DIRECTOR'S CHAIR BACK// A Director's Chair Back printed with the movie's logo just like the ones we will use on set for the cast and crew. Often the director and stars of the film will keep this piece of their chair to remind them of making the movie. Now you can too! Chair not included.
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, an invite to the Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN LOS ANGELES/// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I will stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in LA.
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN NEW YORK CITY// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in NY
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN CHICAGO// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Chicago
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN LONDON// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in London
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN TORONTO// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Toronto
You'll also each get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN SAN FRANCISCO// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in SF
You'll also each get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

**SHIPPING FIXED**ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN TORONTO// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Toronto
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ALAMO DRAFTHOUSE ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN AUSTIN// This screening will be presented by the world famous Alamo Drafthouse, so you know it's gonna be extra fun. I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for some fun and a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Austin, Texas
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

LIMITED EDITION VINYL "WISH I WAS HERE" SOUNDTRACK// You've been asking, here it is! I'm going to press only 1000 copies of the soundtrack on 180 Gram Colored Vinyl in a gatefold. In layman's terms, it's a limited edition record, and it's going to look and sound really groovy.
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, an invite to our Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN BOSTON// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Boston.
You'll also each get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN PARIS// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and your own accommodation in Paris.
You'll also each get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN BERLIN// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in Berlin.
You'll also each get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN ROME// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and your own accommodation in Rome.
You'll also each get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.
SIGNED ART PRINT// Your choice among the select prints included in the $60 reward package, enlarged and signed by me (and if you choose a piece of concept art, artist Colin Fix)
You'll also get the $60 reward art prints, our tee shirt, an invite to our Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.
SIGNED "GARDEN STATE" DVD// Your own personal copy of the film, and I will sign the DVD jacket for you.
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, an invite to our Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.
SIGNED "WISH I WAS HERE" POSTER// A lithograph print of the theatrical poster signed for you by me and the principal members of the cast
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, an invite to our Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

WRITING ON THE WALL// I'll put your name in the movie. My character in the film encounters a wall covered in graffiti each morning. Give me a name for our set designers to paint on the wall. I can’t guarantee every name will be legible in the final cut. But, you will be able to find your name in high rez images of the wall that I’ll send out in the backer update. Your support will forever be a part of the history of how this movie got made, and I will show it.
You'll also get art prints, our tee shirt, an invite to our Backer's Thank You Screening, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.

ADVANCE FILM SCREENING AND Q&A IN LONDON FOR TWO// I will preview the final cut of the movie just for you special backers before it’s released. After the movie, I'll stick around for a live ask me anything Q&A session. You will have to provide your own travel and accommodation in London
You'll also each get art prints, our tee shirt, a sneak peek of the soundtrack, weekly playlists, our Production Diary and the script.
